attributes.action: Make free prescriptions, further education & nursing home care available to everyone  within the UK. Not just Scotland & Wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It can not be right or proper for Citizens of the UK to be treated differently. If we live in Scotland or Wales then free Prescriptions are available regardless of age.
Equally nursing home care for the elderly & free further education to university students is also available.

Goverment spending per head of population should be the same whichever side of the border you live on.
Equal rights means just that.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
